text: "Shotgun" is a 2018 song by George Ezra and is the third single from his second studio album Staying at Tamara's. It topped the single charts in Australia, Belgium, Ireland, New Zealand and the United Kingdom. It went to number 2 in Denmark, number 3 in Israel and the Netherlands, number 4 in Austria and Switzerland and number 12 in Germany. == References == Category:2018 songs Category:George Ezra songs
title: Shotgun (George Ezra song)
